channel.title: We're hiring! IATI Developers and Business & Data Analysts wanted
channel.description:
Are you passionate about the power of open data to transform the impact of billions of dollars of aid and development resources? Do you enjoy helping others to learn new technical skills and improve their data systems? Or are you more about knowing your Python from your Github, your XML from your SQL?
Would you like to put these skills to good use in a growing team of analysts and developers who are dedicated to increasing the quantity and quality of open development data available to governments, parliamentarians, civil society and others?
[Development Initiatives][1], a member of the IATI Secretariat, is looking for:
- [Two Business and Data Analysts][2] - [Two Developers][3]
to work exclusively on IATI.
[Full job descriptions and application details][4].
[1]: http://devinit.org/ [2]: http://devinit.org/about/current-vacancies/ [3]: http://devinit.org/about/current-vacancies/ [4]: http://devinit.org/about/current-vacancies/
